## CredentialUsed interface

Claim information about a credential used. See [ClaimSet.crd](./core.claimset.crd.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CredentialUsed 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./core.credentialused.id.md) | <code>CredentialId</code> | Credential ID |
|  [time](./core.credentialused.time.md) | <code>number</code> | Time when the credential was used, in seconds of a Unix Epoch. |
